tag_list: social-media, facebook, linkedin, twitter, blogging, sco
overview:
I am a Social Media person specializing in Search Engine Optimization (SCO). I help people find ways to use the Internet to promote themselves and deliver value.

I use Facebook, Linkedin, Twitter, Blogging and other social media tools to grow my business and market my products and services online. It enhanced my reputation and I was able to attract new and repeat businesses.
